scripts.build: vue-tsc --noEmit && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.crates: npm run crate:reg && npm run crate:tray
scripts.crate:reg: cd crates/reg-utils && cargo build --release && move /Y target\release\reg-utils.exe ..\..\dist\
scripts.crate:tray: cd crates/tray && cargo build --release && move /Y target\release\tray.dll ..\..\dist\
scripts.tar: tar cf metadata-fetcher.tar deno.json *.md run.bat lib/main.js lib/server.js lib/tray.js lib/info.js dist/*
scripts.7z: 7z a metadata-fetcher.7z -m0=LZMA2 -mx=9 -mhc=off -ms=on -mqs=on -- deno.json *.md run.bat lib/main.js lib/server.js lib/tray.js lib/info.js dist/*
